column1: Little Goat Diner////This restaurant is at a prime location in Chicago. The only downside is to find a good parking stop (Unless you go for Valet). Once you figure out where to park
column2: and when you finally make it here you will love it. You will love all the Goat artsy stuff. We had a 35-40 minute wait time. Once we checked in
column3: we walked around to explore the places around.
